title: Update "Join My Team" CTA destinations to Facebook profile URL

requirements.summary: Update Home page Hero section "Join My Team ★" CTA to navigate to the provided Facebook profile URL (external link) without changing its label or styling.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, clicking the Hero section "Join My Team" button navigates to https://www.facebook.com/share/1CPKURCrY8/.
The button label remains "Join My Team ★" (no user-facing text changes).

file_operations.description: Replace the current internal router Link destination (currently /tasks/task-1) with an external navigation to https://www.facebook.com/share/1CPKURCrY8/ while preserving the existing button label ("Join My Team ★") and all existing classes/styling. Ensure only this CTA destination changes and no other task links are affected.

requirements.summary: Update the Mobile Menu "Join Team" item to navigate to the provided Facebook profile URL while keeping the rest of the mobile menu structure/labels unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: In the mobile hamburger menu, clicking "Join Team" navigates to https://www.facebook.com/share/1CPKURCrY8/.
The rest of the mobile menu structure and labels remain unchanged.

file_operations.description: Change the "Join Team" menu item from an internal router Link (currently /tasks/task-1) to an external link that navigates to https://www.facebook.com/share/1CPKURCrY8/. Keep existing onClose behavior, styling classes, and all other menu items/labels unchanged; do not alter any other navigation destinations (Task 1/2/3, etc.).
